name: Matic DAI Stablecoin
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: DAI-m is a wrapped token that can be bridged to IoTeX from any networks via iotube.MakerDAO has launched Multi-collateral DAI (MCD). This token refers to the new DAI that is collaterized by multiple assets.
